page.title: 19A CHILD'S DAY - CONTINUED.
page.content: 10.45 Playtime,football or play indoors 11.00 Come inside for topic, science, bible or something else. It is quite hard. 12.15 Lunch playtime. The whistle goes and we line up for lunch. Our lunch boxes are on a table, so we grab them and then sit down. I usually have a sausage roll, apple and biscuits or crisps. The school dinner people have something nice too, like fish fingers, chips and peas or salad. For pudding, fruit or yoghurt.Then football again. 1.15 Line up and go in for reading. 1.50 Apparatus in bare feet. The school has got a wooden wall frame and some ropes. My favourite is climbing up and down the ropes. 2.45 Story time, then we go home. 3.30 Watch T.V. and have tea. 8.30 Go to bed.
